comment.author: 92490998@N03
comment._content: My grandfather and dad were miners. I think they mined in Wilder and Davidson. My grandfather was like a foreman or boss I have been told. I am looking for picture and infomation from those mines. I recently drove over to Wilder and Davidson but found nothing there anymore except Davidson school which is a private residence now and Wilder Post Office. I am going back to Wilder Post Office because I didn't stop and I understand there is a museum there too.

comment.author: 98470513@N02
comment._content: Will be travel from Ohio to this area next week. Searching for many years for a cemetery in or near Red Ash. My grandmother Barbara Keen and child Perry Lee Keen are burried there. Mom says there grave is on a hill and next to a big tree, as it seems alot are. I know it's a long shot, but any help we be much appreciated as I've been searching for many years. Grandma was only 28 when she died and mom was only 11. Can someone help me solve this puzzle? Please and thank you for listening.  Sheila,  PS, I can be reached at: sheilajordan79@yahoo.com
